school_name: College of Staten Island (CUNY - Staten Island)
comments: Very unorganized, not helpful at all. Not reasonable and boring. I attended every single class and wrote one essay all semester.

school_name: College of Staten Island (CUNY - Staten Island)
comments: One of the most outgoing and coolest prfessors I have ever took. She was laways there for her and does not require much to get an A

school_name: College of Staten Island (CUNY - Staten Island)
comments: honestly - was one of the worst class experiences i have had since i have been attending the College of Staten Island. Best bet is to drop this class as soon as possible.

school_name: College of Staten Island (CUNY - Staten Island)
comments: must attend everyclass.Doesnt care what your excuses are!!Grade papers according to her own views not the writters views atall.Assign too much essays and wants you to finish it up in a day.Please avoid her.I got a c in that her class.Even atll am supposed to fail that class B- should have been the worst.But she grades carefree

school_name: College of Staten Island (CUNY - Staten Island)
College of Staten Island (CUNY - Staten Island)
comments: This teacher does not follow text books or sylabus or any for of formal teaching skills. drop class asap

school_name: College of Staten Island (CUNY - Staten Island)
comments: Great professor! Very dedicated,helpful and fair, will work with you to help you get good grade. I took two English classes with her and I would absolutely take another one!Highly recommended.

school_name: College of Staten Island (CUNY - Staten Island)
College of Staten Island (CUNY - Staten Island)
comments: She will do all she can to help you pass. She is very lenient if you communicate with her. The class is interesting. She may take a while to get grades up. all in all, good teacher.

school_name: College of Staten Island (CUNY - Staten Island)
comments: She is a good and fair professor. She has equal good attitude with all students and respects student\'s opinions . I had no problem in her class.

school_name: College of Staten Island (CUNY - Staten Island)
comments: Although there are a lot of papers she grades them fair. She isn\'t a bad professor and almost always in a good mood.

school_name: College of Staten Island (CUNY - Staten Island)
comments: Very boring, and not helpful at all. Avoid this teacher
